marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.FreqIndicesWithAmplitudes

Packages that use FreqIndicesWithAmplitudes
marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal Sinusoidal analysis/synthesis framework supporting various approaches:
Conventional sinusoidal analysis/modification/synthesis Harmonic plus Noise Model (HNM) based analysis/modification/synthesis Multiresolution sinusoidal analysis/modification/snythesis - Warning: This is a very basic implementation and it does not work properly!
Sines+transients+noise based analysis/modification/synthesis
